title: Augmented Reality Wearable-Based Food Safety Practical Training

context.prior_knowledge: Basic food safety principles and foundational hygiene management skills
context.additional_context: Customized practical training for professionals applying augmented reality wearable technology via smartphones

learning_goals: Learners can accurately perform at least three hygiene procedures in food handling processes using augmented reality wearable technology.
Learners improve their intention to comply with food safety regulations by over 20% through first-person perspective practice videos.
Learners can identify and respond to at least five food safety risk factors in real work environments through project-based assignments.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
